name: SQLearn
tag_list: e-learning, elearning, lms, lessons, synchronous-learning, asynchronous-learning
overview:
SQLearn specializes in the provision of integrated e-learning solutions. SQLearn addresses enterprises and educational institutions offering them the best experience on e-learning. Being pioneer, we use best-of-breed technology and select open source tools, ensuring our clients the best possible result followed by an immediate return on investment.

Our flagship product is “e-learning suite”, an integrated e-learning environment of Synchronous and Asynchronous education which provides all the utilities needed for the management of the educational process.

SQLearn also provides a digital library of high quality multimedia educational material. It is aimed at adults and has been built based on the principles of pedagogy and instructional design for e-learning, allowing the user to interact directly with the educational material. Foreign Languages for adults
